title: India Launches New Space Mission
description: ISRO successfully launched its latest satellite into orbit, marking a milestone for the Indian space program.

title: Global Markets See Recovery
description: Stock markets around the world rebounded today after news of positive economic indicators.

title: Education Ministry Unveils New Policy
description: The government has announced sweeping reforms in the education sector, aiming to increase access and quality.

title: Scientists Develop New COVID-19 Vaccine
description: A new vaccine has shown promising results in early trials, according to researchers at a leading medical institute.

title: Heavy Rainfall Predicted in Mumbai
description: The IMD has issued a red alert for Mumbai and nearby regions due to expected heavy rainfall in the coming days.
